name: Over the Clouds (mad)
description:
Over the Clouds is a 3D platformer where the player controls a ball that must bounce of objects and change their color in order to win.

Programmer
Eudes Tenório

Sound Designer
Jaret Sanchez

3d modeler / Interface designer
Mateus Germoglio

Game Designer
Valmir Neto

Thanks for playing!
Over the Clouds is a 3D version of the game "Qbert".

(Jam's theme was to take the mechanics of a game and change its dimension (3D to 2D, 2D to 3D)
